        achieve facing_char(char, remote) # Ensure the character is facing the remote

behavior turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        assert has_switch(tv)
        # Ensure that the TV has a switch

        achieve is_off(tv)
        # Ensure the TV is currently off

        touch(remote_control)
        # Use the remote control

        achieve is_on(tv)
        # Ensure the TV is now on
